name: Neon Fantasy: Horses
description:
Neon Fantasy: Horses is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

Neon Fantasy: Horses is a puzzle game featuring beautiful horses in a neon style.
Your goal is to assemble a picture of neon horses that has been cut into an equal number of pieces.

The game features several levels of difficulty, allowing you to choose the optimal level for your experience and mood. Regardless of the difficulty, you can enjoy high-quality images of horses in bright neon style.

In Neon Fantasy: Horses:

•50 levels
•Neon art
•Simple controls (mouse)
•Achievements
•Relaxing music
